title: Полярный
overview: The bandit Vitya Myasnik, known in the mid-90s, who retired long ago and owns an eco-farm, at the request of a former accomplice, agreed to overstay the thieves' community on his offshore bank account. When it came time to return the money, by the will of circumstances, Vitya forgot the password from the account. Realizing that no one will believe him, he runs and accidentally ends up in the city of Polyarny located in the North.
